86 inline i2d::CVector2d CScreenTransform::GetClientPosition(istd::CIndex2d position) const
87 {
88  i2d::CVector2d result;
89  i2d::CVector2d pos(position.GetX(), position.GetY());
90 
91  m_invert.GetApply(pos, result);
92 
93  return result;
94 }

97 inline istd::CIndex2d CScreenTransform::GetScreenPosition(const i2d::CVector2d& position) const
98 {
99  i2d::CVector2d result;
100  GetApply(position, result);
101 
102  return istd::CIndex2d(int(result.GetX()), int(result.GetY()));
103 }
